item.title: Drone
item.description: Option 1 - buy off the shelf Jumper t-lite v2 ELRS 375 RON Firefly 1S FR Nano Baby Quad 800 RON FPV receiver 200 RON Total: 1.375 RON Option 2 - build Flight controller Camera + VTX VTX FPV cam Frame? Frame2? FPV receiver

item.title: Jokes
item.description: Dad jokes I asked my date to meet me at the gym today. She didn’t show up. That’s when I knew we weren’t gonna work out. Today a man knocked on my door and asked for a small donation to the local swimming pool. I gave him a glass of water.
